devdoc.details: All function calls are only executed by contract owner

constructor.details: deploys AidToken and Rahat contract by sending supply to this contract

createAndsetProjectBudget_ERC1155(string.details: create token and allocate them to the given projectId, Creates project and transfer tokens to Rahat contract.

params._address: address to send the minted tokens

setProjectBudget_ERC1155(string,uint256,.details: Allocates token to the given projectId, Creates project and transfer tokens to Rahat contract.

params._projectCapital: amount of ERC1155 token with _tokenId allocated to project

setProjectBudget_ERC20(string,uint256).details: Allocates token to the given projectId, Creates project and transfer tokens to Rahat contract.

params._amount: Amount to withdraw token from this contract
